title: Russian strikes near Kharkiv kill four, including children, Ukraine says
summary_full: The bodies of three toddlers and a 34-year-old man were pulled from the wreckage of a house in north-eastern Ukraine.
summary_public: The bodies of three toddlers and a 34-year-old man were pulled from the wreckage of a house in north-eastern Ukraine.
